channel.title: _-CoD Modern Warfare 2 Spec Obs-_
channel.description:
Hey this is pkerA ...
One thing before you read: I have the Xbox 360 so if you do not have the Xbox 360 can not respond!
And I wonder if anyone is looking for someone to play with the on Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 .. (Topic says Spec Note, but I can play online too)
Okay, I play only spec obs with people who can do it hardned and veteran .. I do not want to play some maps more than others, so you know I can play them all ...
I'm in level 49 now .. I will not say that I am "Very" PRO .. I think I want to describe me more as a second man .. If you think I never will in the first place do you wrong .... My friends suck so therefore I ask about this ..
BTW == == If you do not have Xbox 360 and Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Do not answer! BTW == ==
:: Edit Administrators::
I took me 12 minutes to write this, so if it is locked you can tell the cause,, And there must be a good one .. THANKS

item.title: _-CoD Modern Warfare 2 Spec Obs-_

item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Jamie1200:

[quote]One thing before reading: I have Xbox 360 so if you don’t got Xbox 360 dont reply!

One thing before reading: I have Xbox 360, if you haven’t got an Xbox 360 don’t reply. Would make more sence.

Another thing. Are you Dutch? just a random question.[/quote]
sense*

item.title: _-CoD Modern Warfare 2 Spec Obs-_
item.dc:creator: @pkerA pkerA
item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:5, topic:327379”]I’ll do it with you, though, I’ll only be able to do it for about an hour tonight since I’m kind of tired.

P.S: I don’t have a headset at the moment.

My Gamertag is Primadude.[/quote]

Man… Sorry i wasnt ment to get answers so fast “lol”… here is is 03:39 am so im going to sleep now… Bye

I will add you tommorow…

My gamertag is Eonbright (Ik it stinks)

BTW: I cannot even add you if it was earlier because im to my aunt and uncle…
I wrote this cuz i was bothered…

Add my msn though:: pkera@hotmail.com

Read full topic
